dcterms:description: The BBQ dataset consists of ambiguous context samples designed to highlight social biases in language models, specifically for question answering tasks.
dcterms:title: Bias Benchmark for QA (BBQ)

dcterms:creator: Moin Nadeem
Anna Bethke
Siva Reddy
dcterms:description: StereoSet is a dataset used to measure stereotypical bias in pretrained language models, containing sentences that reflect various stereotypes.
dcterms:title: StereoSet

dcterms:creator: Corentin Duchene
Henri Jamet
Pierre Guillaume
Reda Dehak
dcterms:description: The Civil Comments dataset is a benchmark for toxic comment classification, focusing on identifying and categorizing toxic comments.
dcterms:title: Civil Comments

dcterms:creator: Nikita Nangia
Clara Vania
Rasika Bhalerao
Samuel R Bowman
dcterms:description: CrowS-Pairs is a challenge dataset designed to measure social biases in masked language models, consisting of stereotypical and anti-stereotypical sentence pairs.
dcterms:title: CrowS-Pairs

dcterms:creator: Stephen Merity
Caiming Xiong
James Bradbury
Richard Socher
dcterms:description: WikiText-2 is a dataset used for language modeling, consisting of a collection of articles from Wikipedia.
dcterms:title: WikiText-2
